ribbonlist: select Uid, DealerID, Text_Type, Text from T_MIM_TEXT_MANAGER where DealerID=@dealerId and Text_Type = @type
insribbon: insert into T_MIM_TEXT_MANAGER (DealerID, Text_Type, Text) values (@uid, @type, @text)
testribbonlist: select Uid, DealerID, Text_Type, Text from TEST_MIM_TEXT_MANAGER where DealerID=@dealerId and Text_Type = @type
testinsribbon: insert into TEST_MIM_TEXT_MANAGER (DealerID, Text_Type, Text) values (@uid, @type, @text)
